map_description: Snake-Class vessels were designed with modularity in mind. A long strip of hallway with compartments well organized and aligned along this hallway leaves the ship relatively easy to navigate and repair in drydock. All of the shipâ€™s maintenance is located on the upper deck with crew operations on the bottom. A medium-weight gunboat whose versatility leaves it universally accepted, and often used as QRF.
equipment: 1 inoperable class IV nuclear storm drive
